PRO-SEC, the solution for your cleaning needs: Dry cleaning services for carpets, furniture, rugs and mats!
Our cleaning process is safe for the environment and effective for all stains that have not damaged the natural colour of the fibres and fabrics.

Trust PRO-SEC for dry cleaning services that are perfectly safe for pets and family members!

With over 25 years of experience, PRO-SEC specializes in the dry cleaning of carpets, handmade or imported rugs (Aubusson, Persian, Chinese, Berber) and rugs for the commercial and residential sector, including condominions.

Carpet cleaning montreal is the leading carpet cleaning company catering to all cleaning related services including residential carpet cleaning, commercial carpet cleaning, upholstery cleaning, furniture cleaning, rug cleaning, mattress cleaning and much more. 
Our missions is 100% customer satisfaction because we simple provide the best services, quality cleaning and best customer service. With our years of experience in cleaning, we provide have many satisfied customers with repeat service as they know we always deliver the top quality in the market. We are proud of the equipment we have latest in the market and we use the highest quality and strong products to remove all and any dirt and stains on top and below the surface. We deliver high quality at the best prices in Montreal. Just call us to compare prices and see for yourself.
Our services include all the following, Residential Carpet Cleaning, Commercial Carpet Cleaning, Upholstery Cleaning, Furniture Cleaning, Mattress Cleaning, Spot and Stain Removal, Odor Removal,   Area Rug and Rug Cleaning,Water Damage Removal, Fire Damage Removal, Mold and Mild Dew removal, Tile and Grout Cleaning, Building and Renovation Cleaning.

We cater to any situation no matter how hard or tough it is. 
We also understand that not every carpet material and situation and stain is the same. We want to exceed your expectations hence we strive to provide the highest quality and service the industry can offer. Carpet Cleaning montreal is proud to provide this quality of service and cleaning at the best prices possible. Our mission is your complete satisfaction including price.
We provide carpet cleaning service to Montreal and surrounding areas. Our staff is bilingual and trained to take care of any situation and based on your specific need. SOS Nettoyage de Tapis Montreal specializes in carpet cleaning services. This implies we offer you a satisfaction guarantee. We make sure to research and understand the material of your carpet and sofas so that we can get the most profound and intensive cleaning while utilizing the most recent and best equipment in the industry. Each carpet will get the extra care, products, cleaning that fits its material and situation the best making sure to remove the stains and return the material back to the best possible clean and state it originally came in. Our methods is to use equipment that wont damage the carpet original material and state and steam it to make sure that the rug becomes spotless, sterilized and looking new and feathery once more.
Our years of experience in this industry combined with our high customer satisfaction and our business goals makes us the best choice for any client or business. We work towards making sure our clients are getting the most out of the treatment so that have astounding quality cleaning with the best carpet cleaning supplier in Montreal at the best costs.
We offer Residential and commercial Carpet Cleaning, Sofa and Upholstery Cleaning, Furniture Cleaning, Mattress Cleaning, Spot and Stain Removal, Odor Removal, Area Rug  Cleaning, Water &Fire Damage Removal, Mold and Mild Dew removal, Tile and Grout Cleaning, Building and Renovation after Cleaning.
Our clients loveall our services and packages for cleaning, we offer home & business services to clean your rug and furniture and we offer pickup and deliver rug services as well. We are happy to inform our customers of the benefits and health improvements that can be achieved by having our carpet cleaning services, dust and dust mites including dirt and insects can accumulate over years from regular home cleaning using a vacuum. Any expert cleaner will let you know that the best way to dispose of these bugs in your carpets is by performing heavy and intense professional steam cleaning.
We provide carpet cleaning servicesto Montreal, Laval, Brossard, South shore, DDO, West Island and surrounding areas. Our staff is bilingual and are available to help answer any of your questions or concerns. Call us now at (514) 900-3362 for more information.
